data.description: Large In Ground Heated Pool with Hot Tub. Professionally closed this year by its builder, Sardelli Pools. Basement has been professionally waterproofed. BEAUTIFUL Sterling Heights Ranch. Beautiful patio done in 2019. This home features major updates in 2019-2020. All newer stainless-steel appliances stay plus freezer. Large granite dining room with chairs. Hardwood floors throughout most of the home. Super large family room with natural fireplace and large door wall. The pool is VERY well maintained and upgraded condition.
